reference.Rmd

Search globally in the search box below, or navigate the index clicking the menu on the right.

Global search

Handle dataset snapshots

? possible_snapshots Datasets to snapshot
? take_snapshot Snapshots datasets and the configuration file

Handle the configuration file

? default_config, example_config, get_config Create a path pointing to a configuration file
? edit_config Edit the default configuration file
? show_config Show a configuration file

Documentation for generic datasets

? data_dictionary Data dictionary
? loanbook_description Description of a generic loanbook dataset

Exported datasets

These datasets are directly accessible when you attach the package.

? loanbook_fake Fake loanbook
? BENCH.REGIONS Dataset to bridge from country to all existing bench regions it is in
? INDEX.REGIONS Dataset to identify the equity index regions based on the MSCI factsheets
? BicsSectorBridge Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? GROUPS.GOVT Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? RevenueSplit Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? sector.bridge Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? SectorBridge Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? TYPE.EQUITY Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? TYPE.OTHERS Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Datastore datasets

These datasets are accessible via functions that get them from a local copy of 2dii’s Dropbox folder.

? ALD.BV Dataset
? ALD.CB Dataset
? ALD.CC Dataset
? ALD.Company Dataset
? ALD.EQ Dataset
? ALD.SPV Dataset
? BALANCE.SHEET.DATA Dataset
? CB_OG Dataset
? EQ_OG Dataset
? FIN.DATA Dataset
? FundsTrusts Dataset
? Receipts Dataset
? SEC.TYPE.BONDS Dataset
? TYPE.BONDS Dataset
? TYPE.RECEIPTS Dataset

Other datasets

These datasets are accessible via functions that get them from a local copy of 2dii’s Dropbox folder.

? DebtMarket Dataset
? DebtMarketClimate Dataset
? EQMarket.Size Dataset
? Fund.Data Dataset
? Indices Dataset
? LoanMarket Dataset
? LoanMarketClimate Dataset
? PHYSICAL.RISK.CB Dataset
? PHYSICAL.RISK.EQ Dataset
? SCEN Dataset
? SCENLong Dataset

Paths pointing to 2dii’s dropbox-folder

These datasets are accessible via functions that get them from a local copy of 2dii’s Dropbox folder.

? MASTER.DATA.PATH, FIN.DATA.PATH, CBMARKET.DATA.PATH, DATA.STORE.PATH, ANALYSIS.INPUTS.PATH Create paths to specific 2dii directories, depending on a configuration file
? USER.NAME, DROPBOX.PATH, GIT.PATH, WEBTOOL.PATH, COMPANY.PATH, dbox_port_00, SCENARIO.DATA.PATH, dbox_port2_10proj, EQMARKET.DATA.PATH, MARKET.DATA.PATH, INDEX.DATA.PATH, INDEX.RESULTS.DATA.PATH, FUND.DATA.PATH Create paths to specific 2dii directories

Access configuration parameters

? FINANCIAL.TIMESTAMP, timestamps_datastore_export, ALD.TIMESTAMP, DATASTORE.TIMESTAMP, DATAPREP.TIMESTAMP, START.YEAR, TIME.HORIZON, RISK.YEAR, ADDITIONAL.YEAR, TECH.LIST, TECH.EXCLUDE, SECTOR.LIST, OTHER.SECTOR.LIST, SCENARIO.SOURCES.LIST, IEA.SCENARIO.LIST, WEB.REGION.LIST, SCENARIO.GEOGRAPHIES.LIST, EQUITY.MARKET.LIST, GLOBAL.AGGREGATE.SECTOR.LIST, GLOBAL.AGGREGATE.SCENARIO.SOURCES.LIST, CREATE.META.PORTFOLIO, META.INVESTOR.NAME, META.PORTFOLIO.NAME, HasBV, HasRISK, HasMAP, HasSB Access parameters from a configuration file
? get_param Create functions to access configuration parameters

Miscellaneous

? browse_private_site Browse private site
? build_private_site Build private website
? degrees Insert the symbol for degrees
? set_version Set version number as ‘major.minor.patch[.dev].datastore.snapshot’
